title: BOWL'D
typeOfFood: American, Fast food, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast causal eatery serving bowl-based entrees with choice of toppings, including lightly cooked veggies and house-made sauces. The Mediterranean and sweet chili pineapple signature bowls are both vegan, and the other signature bowls can be made vegan. Or build your own bowl.. Drinks include whole fruit smoothies. Bright space, on a busy corner. Opened 2015.
